historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-1303.3.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-115, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 43-1303.01.

DC CODE § 47-1303.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor shall issue a deed for the bid off property sold pursuant to § 47-1303.02 to the person whose offer the Mayor accepts.
The deed shall be prima facie evidence of a good and perfect title in fee simple to the bid off property.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
